CustomField.description: CC BWRD Internal Motivation Weighted Score Auto
CustomField.formula: CASE( Internal_Motivation__c, '(1) Low Motivation', 1 * Internal_Motivation_Weight__c, '(2) Medium Motivation', 2 * Internal_Motivation_Weight__c, '(3) High Motivation', 3 * Internal_Motivation_Weight__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Internal Motivation Weighted Score
